name: Cyber Ball (RigelGamesStudio)
description: The project is still raw, but I am actively working on it, I ask you to support it financially than you can, the project itself has been sent to the game balance 2004, but with a new setting and modern graphics.I hope for your help in completing the project.I am actively working on it while I am working on the mechanics of the game, I am making a fully working prototype of the game, the models are taken from the portal 2 game, but this is all for the time of prototyping, later I will replace them with my 3d models.
